prefix: the prefix for this server is `$1`. You can change the prefix with `$1settings prefix`. For a list of all commands see `$1help`.
missingperm: I'm missing some permissions for this command:
limit:
🚨 **Stop, you hit a limit!** 🚨

$1, your message contained too many commands!
disclaimer:
I am a small bot with the purpose to easily link and search MediaWiki sites like Gamepedia and Fandom wikis. I show short descriptions and additional info about pages and am able to resolve redirects and follow interwiki links. $1 wrote me in JavaScript.

You can support me on Patreon:
helpserver: For questions and problems please visit my support server:
patreon:
this is a Patreon only feature!
You can support me on Patreon to get access to this feature:

Use `$1 <prefix>` to change the prefix.
Use `_` at the end to indicate a space at end of the prefix.
The prefix may not include mentions!

pause.on: I'm now paused on this server and will ignore most commands!
pause.off: I'm no longer paused on this server and will respond to all commands again!

voice.text: I try to give everyone in a voice channel a specific role:

voice.disabled: you disabled the function to add roles for voice channels.
voice.name: voice channel name

verification.no_role: please provide a role for the new verification.
verification.current: these are the current verifications for this server:
verification.current_selected: this is the verification `$1` for this server:
verification.missing: there are no verifications for this server yet.
verification.rename_no_permission: **$1 is missing the `Manage Nicknames` permission to force wiki usernames!**

verify.error: The verification failed due to an error.
verify.error_reply: the verification failed due to an error, please try again.
verify.missing: there are no verifications set up for this channel.
verify.user_missing_reply: your linked wiki user "$1" doesn't exist.
verify.user_blocked_reply: your linked wiki user **"$1" is blocked!**
verify.user_gblocked_reply: your linked wiki user **"$1" is globally blocked!**
verify.user_disabled_reply: your linked wiki user **"$1" is disabled!**
verify.user_failed: Discord user $1 doesn't match the wiki user $2.
verify.user_failed_reply: your Discord tag doesn't match the wiki user "$1".
verify.user_matches: Discord user $1 matches the wiki user $2, but doesn't meet the requirements for any roles.
verify.user_matches_reply: your Discord tag matches the wiki user "$1", but you don't meet the requirements for any roles.
verify.user_verified: Discord user $1 has been successfully verified as wiki user $2.
verify.user_verified_reply: you have been successfully verified as wiki user "$1".
verify.user_renamed: Their Discord nickname has been changed to their wiki username.
verify.qualified_error: Qualified for, but could not add:
verify.help_guide: Follow [this guide]($1) to add your Discord tag to your wiki profile:
verify.help_subpage: Please add your Discord tag ($1) to your Discord subpage on the wiki:

rcscript.title: Recent changes webhook
rcscript.ad: You want recent changes directly in Discord? Use `$1rcscript` to add a recent changes webhook based on **$2** to your Discord server!
rcscript.missing: there are no recent changes webhooks for this server yet.
rcscript.current: these are the current recent changes webhooks for this server:
rcscript.current_selected: this is the recent changes webhook for this server:
rcscript.noadmin: you need the `Manage Webhooks` permission for this command!
rcscript.max_entries: you already reached the maximal amount of recent changes webhooks.
rcscript.sysmessage: the system message `$1` has to be the server id `$2` to add a recent changes webhook.
rcscript.added: a recent changes webhook has been added for:
rcscript.deleted: the recent changes webhook has be deleted.
rcscript.webhook_failed: sadly the webhook couldn't be created, please try again later.
rcscript.current_wiki: the wiki for this webhook is:
rcscript.updated_wiki: the wiki for this webhook has been changed to:
rcscript.current_lang: the language for this webhook is:
rcscript.updated_lang: the language for this webhook has been changed to:
rcscript.current_display: the display mode for this webhook is:
rcscript.help_display_compact: Compact text messages with inline links.
rcscript.help_display_embed: Embed messages with edit tags and category changes.
rcscript.help_display_diff: Embed messages with image previews and edit differences.
rcscript.updated_display: the display mode for this webhook has been changed to:
rcscript.disabled_feeds: the feeds based changes, like discussions, message walls and article comments, for this webhook have been disabled.
rcscript.enabled_feeds: the feeds based changes, like discussions, message walls and article comments, for this webhook have been enabled.
rcscript.no_feeds: the wiki for this webhook has no feeds based features, like discussions, message walls or article comments, enabled.

webhook.created: A recent changes webhook for $1 has been added to this channel.
webhook.updated_wiki: The wiki has been changed to $1 for this recent changes webhook.
webhook.updated_lang: The language has been changed to `$1` for this recent changes webhook.
webhook.updated_display_compact: The display mode has been changed to compact text messages with inline links for this recent changes webhook.
webhook.updated_display_embed: The display mode has been changed to embed messages with edit tags and category changes for this recent changes webhook.
webhook.updated_display_image: The display mode has been changed to embed messages with image previews for this recent changes webhook.
webhook.updated_display_diff: The display mode has been changed to embed messages with image previews and edit differences for this recent changes webhook.
webhook.disabled_feeds: The feeds based changes, like discussions, message walls and article comments, have been disabled for this recent changes webhook.
webhook.enabled_feeds: The feeds based changes, like discussions, message walls and article comments, have been enabled for this recent changes webhook.
webhook.deleted: This recent changes webhook will be deleted.

gblock.text: Blocked on $1 until $2 by $3 on $4 with reason "$5".

search.infopage: Not the correct result? Use $1 for a direct link.
search.infosearch: Not the correct result? Use $1 for a direct link or $2 for a list of all hits.

test.pause: I'm currently paused on this server.
text: and believe me, I am still alive.
I'm doing science and I'm still alive.
I feel fantastic and I'm still alive.
test.MediaWiki: Requires at least $1 for full functionality, found `$2`.
test.TextExtracts: Requires the extension $1 for page descriptions.
test.PageImages: Requires the extension $1 for page thumbnails.

help.all: So, you want to know what things I can do? Here is a list of all commands that I understand:
help.admin: These commands can only be performed by administrators:
help.noadmin: you need the `Manage Server` permission for these commands!
help.pause:
**I'm currently paused on this server!**
Only these commands can be performed:
help.footer: If you got an unwanted response, you can react with 🗑️ to my message and I will delete it.

default.desc: I will answer with a link to a matching article in the wiki.

link.desc: I will answer with a direct link to the article in the wiki.

template.desc: I will answer with a link to the article in the wiki.

gamepedia.desc: I will answer with a link to a matching article in the named Gamepedia wiki: `https://<wiki>.gamepedia.com/`

fandom.desc: I will answer with a link to a matching article in the named Fandom wiki: `https://<wiki>.fandom.com/`

wikia.desc: I will answer with a link to a matching article in the named Wikia wiki: `https://<wiki>.wikia.org/`

mwprojects.desc: I will answer with a link to a matching article in the named MediaWiki project. Example: `$1!!en.wikipedia.org Cookie`

user.desc: I will show some information about the user.

overview.desc: I will show some information and statistics about the wiki.

random.desc: I will answer with a link to a random page in the wiki.

id.desc: I will answer with a link to the diff in the wiki.

name.desc: I will answer with a link to the last diff on the article in the wiki.

page.desc: I will answer with a direct link to the article in the wiki.

search.desc: I will answer with a direct link to the search page for the article in the wiki.

default.desc: I will answer with the syntax of the Minecraft command and a link to the article for the command in the Minecraft Wiki.

command.desc: I will answer with the syntax of the Minecraft command and a link to the article for the command in the Minecraft Wiki.

bug.desc: I will answer with a link to the bug in the Minecraft bug tracker.

thread.desc: I will answer with a link to a matching discussion thread in the Fandom wiki.

post.desc: I will answer with a link to a matching discussion post in the Fandom wiki.

default.desc: I will list all the commands that I understand.

command.desc: Wonder how a command works? Let me explain it to you!

admin.desc: I will list all administrator commands.

verification.desc: I will explain in more detail how the verification command works.

default.desc: I will change the settings for this server.

wiki.desc: I will change the default wiki for this server.

lang.desc: I will change the language for this server.

inline.desc: I will toggle inline commands for this server.

prefix.desc: I will change the prefix for this server.

channel.desc: I will change the overwrites for the current channel.

verify.desc: Use this command to verify your Discord account with your wiki account and get roles matching your wiki account.

default.desc: I will change the wiki verifications used by the `$1verify` command.

add.desc: I will add a new wiki verification. Accepts a `|` separated list.

channel.desc: I will change the channel for the wiki verification. Accepts a `|` separated list.

role.desc: I will change the role for the wiki verification. Accepts a `|` separated list.

editcount.desc: I will change the minimal edit count for the wiki verification.

usergroup.desc:
I will change the user group for the wiki verification. Accepts a `|` separated list.
	• Provide `AND` as the first list entry to make all provided user groups required.

accountage.desc: I will change the minimal account age (in days) for the wiki verification.

rename.desc: I will change if the user's Discord nickname should be changed to their wiki username for the wiki verification.

delete.desc: I will delete the wiki verification.

default.desc: I will change the recent changes webhook.

add.desc: I will add a new recent changes webhook.

wiki.desc: I will change the wiki for the recent changes webhook.

lang.desc: I will change the language for the recent changes webhook.

display.desc: I will change the display mode for the recent changes webhook.

feeds.desc: I will toggle discussions changes on a Fandom wiki for the recent changes webhook.

delete.desc: I will delete the recent changes webhook.

voice.desc: I try to give everyone in a voice channel a specific role.

inactive.desc: I will ignore all commands on this server, except a few admin commands.

active.desc: I will respond to all commands on this server again.

test.desc: If I'm active, I'll answer! Otherwise not.
